para: The following new features have been added since 4.0.4:

listitem.simpara: New XSL transforms to show the list of available services and their full EPRs
Sorting and optional automatic refresh in the standard view.
Improved support for definitions of custom summary lines for new data types in the standard view.

para: Because this is a minor release, these new features are disabled by default; see the administrator's guide for instructions for enabling them.
